Name: Low Story
About the game: You will never see the day. IN-GAME FEATURES Basically you will fight against enemies with 8 direction aiming method (with toggle aim), duble jumping, rolling and bullet rain skill. As you progress through the game, you'll also get some active and passive skills, effective unique items and different weapons. You can also take additional equipments and powers from the shop. There are 6 levels in the game with completely dark and surreal atmospheres and 1 additional cave level for Shopkeeper quests. The game includes full gamepad control support and 10 Steam achievements. You can also get a pet named Orphanic to help you on your journeys.
Meta Title: Low Story: Jan 11, 2021, Engin Baştürk and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Low Story? Check out the release date (Jan 11, 2021), developer insights from Engin Baştürk, and a complete game summary.
